judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the decision of this case.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Cueiam,
Judgment affirmed.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: Pee Cueiam,

attorneys: Michael L. Levy and John W. Packet, Assistant Defenders, and Vincent J. Ziccardi, Defender, for appellant.

David B. Scott and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Bichard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Reid, Appellant.
Submitted November 9, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Michael L. Levy and John W. Packet, Assistant Defenders, and Vincent J. Ziccardi, Defender, for appellant.
David B. Scott and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Bichard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
March 18, 1971:
